welcome to Hope for Vulnarables people

Hope for vulnerable people transforms the lives of the most vulnerable and marginalized people in South Western Uganda through the provision of quality Educated, Health promotion and other community based program.
We seek to strengthen local communities and partners to be the rivers of change in their own communities.

There are more than 3-2 millions of orphans, abandoned children who regularly go hungry and sleep on streets in Uganda with no government resource to meet their needs. These children are left helpless and susceptible to preventable diseases, violence, crime and worse. Through, you can meet their basic needs and provide them hope for a better future.

CHILDREN SPONSOR SHIP PROGRAM.

Child sponsorship transforms the lives of vulnerable children. We work with children and their families in some of the poor areas of Uganda , Where we support families to lift themselves out of poverty through education .
Where improving, basic literacy and numeracy and working a long side communities to help them to understand their children rights and raise their voices to protect and provide for their children. Basic hygiene

sponsors will be receiving infromation about the children they support like health status, history and more about children’s parents. Update and letters from your child twice a year and mailings. Periodic updates of performance in class and Opportunity to send your child letters and gifts . The one sponsoring the child is having an opportunity to visit the child in Uganda. If he or she is capable

Our vision is to see educated, skilled young people, Inspired by faith, Hope and love and transformation of their children.
Covid19 has globally affected every one on earth to some extent , though with vulnarable people it has left them nothing but depression, hunger and literraly un fair livelihood in alomst every commuinty, We there transformed all our capalities to reach out to these people more on projects that are needed urgently like food relief and more, continue to support in all ways to them, thanks aslo to you who are willing to give a hand

Objectives

  • To improve members on house hold’s income
  • To empower the children and youth through Education
  • To be united as one voice for financial, social and economic development
  • To improve on the health standards of people and communities
  • To promote economic development and prosperity for all
  • To fight diseases that has promoted poverty and led to Vulnarables

Our Mission

  • To improve, develop and improve the health standards of living.
